name: The Heathen's Brand
tooltip:
The Heathen's BrandLevel 60

Know this, heathen: A catastrophe has brought us together. Your pagan ways are neither understood nor appreciated by Zandalar but we are a fair people. Wear this brand around your neck. It shall serve as both a warning to our enemies and a symbol of your friendship to Zandalar.

Continue to serve our people and I will amplify the power of the brand.
